FuncDef:
The preferred-control-word command enables the preferred control word function for a VPLS PW.
The undo preferred-control-word command disables the preferred control word function for a VPLS PW.
By default, the preferred control word function is disabled for a VPLS PW.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In load balancing mode, packets may arrive out of order. In this case, you can add the control word to packets for sequence identification.
If two PEs connect to each other over an Ethernet link and CEs connect to PEs over PPP links, PPP negotiation may fail if the size of PPP control packets does not meet the minimum MTU requirements of the Ethernet. In this case, you can add the control word as padding bits to PPP control packets.
Prerequisites
A VSI and the corresponding VPLS PW have been configured.
